name: SMLEditor
short_description: The Gateways Team of the Live-Virtual-Constructive Architecture Roadmap Implementation (LVCAR-I) effort is developing a set of tools that will support the gateway community.  One of these tools is the Simulation Data Exchange Model (SDEM) Mapping Language (SML) Editor.  The tool provides the ability to import two SDEMs in their native language and subsequently view the entities that need to be mapped between the two SDEMs.  The SDEM Editor also allows the user to create these mappings and store the result in an SML file.
summary: Prototype editor for the SDEM Mapping Language
